title: Towerfall: Ascension (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_towerfall_ascension_2.2.0.3.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: TOWERFALL: ASCENSION
Genre: Action - Combat - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.7.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player - Co-op
Released: March 11, 2014
Size: 376.2 MB
Company: Matt Makes Games / Matt Makes Games
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/towerfall_ascension

About:
TowerFall Ascension is the definitive version of the hit archery combat game. Inspired by classics from the golden age of couch multiplayer, it's a 4-player local party game centering around hilarious, intense versus matches. The core mechanics are simple and accessible, but hard to master and combat is fierce.
Fast, accessible, and deep local multiplayer combat.
Customize your matches with over 70 game variants.
FullÂ­featured singleÂ­player and coÂ­op Quest mode.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows Vista or newer
Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: Intel HD 4000 
DirectX: Version 10 
Hard Drive: 400 MB available space
